title: Hot Vacherin

default: fresh figs, chicory, biscuits and raisin bread, to serve

steps: Place the whole Vacherin, in its lidded box, on a baking tray in the oven and bake for 20-25 minutes until runny.
Place the box of melted cheese on a serving plate and serve with fresh figs and chicory and some savoury biscuits and raisin bread, like a fondue.
